Plot: Haunted by painful memories and increasing paranoia, a damaged woman struggles to re-assimilate with her family after fleeing an abusive cult.
Title: Martha Marcy May Marlene
Actors: Elizabeth Olsen, Christopher Abbott, Brady Corbet, Hugh Dancy
tomatoConsensus: Led by a mesmerizing debut performance from Elizabeth Olsen, Martha Marcy May Marlene is a distinctive, haunting psychological drama.
